main.name: Alek Valencia
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Full-Stack Engineer with a background in sales and service work and a certificate in Full Stack Development from UCLA Extension. Known as a hard-working, problem-solver that gets along well with others. Have developed applications from scratch as well as refactor code to make applications run smoother and have less load time. Have also completed several group projects implementing API calls from the server and client-side and created a React application from scratch.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to reach out to about any of my projects, hiring purposes, or collaborating.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
